name: Sheltered Living Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Sheltered Living Inc. is a Custodial Care Facility, Adult Care Home provider based in Topeka, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $42.6M in Medicaid payments across 54K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $42.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
